comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Fin Wilson was born on Sunday, December 9, 1888, in East Fork, Kentucky. Wilson was 25 years old when he broke into the big leagues on September 26, 1914, with the Brooklyn Tip-Tops. www.baseball-almanac.com/players/player.php?p=wilsofi01 the problem I have with this photo is baseball almanac doesn't show any player with even just the last name Wilson having ever played a single game for any Cleveland team 1908-1919 (Blues, Naps, or Indians) and they show Fin Wilson playing for Brooklyn in 1914/15 and not any MLB before that. Baseball-reference.com also has him only playing 1914/15 Debut September 26, 1914 Final Game September 27, 1915 and read more about the Tiptops here en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooklyn_Tip-Tops this one is a true mystery, why the heck would Fin Wilson be in a Cleveland uniform?
